>
[See the Unseen](/Feats.aspx?ID=2815) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You notice things that others can't see at all. While you're adjacent to an [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) creature of your level or lower, it is instead only [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from you. You only need a successful DC 5 flat check to target a hidden creature.
